A network of talents at the service of a: Un réseaux de talents au service de tous
Growing together, hand in hand, a talent: Grandir ensemble, main dans la main, une alliance de talents pour un avenir radieux grâce à la cooptation, telle est la clé de notre réussite collective.
The Cooption consists of activating one': The Cooption consists of activating one's professional or personal network to recommend and support the candidacy of a recruiter or a person looking for a job
This new way of recruiting is gratifying: This new way of recruiting is gratifying. By coopting a person around you, you receive a fair sum with a fair offer that will make a business for you.
In addition to saving time, the recruite: In addition to saving time, the recruiter is sure to find the profile that best matches the job offer since the candidate is recommended for his or her skills and the coopter will get a score for the match of the candidat to the post.
This recruitment channel allows the recr: This recruitment channel allows the recruiter to reach more candidates, even the most difficult ones. It also makes it possible to open up to new profiles, even the most “typical”.
A question ? A dysfunction ? The Cooptal: A question ? A dysfunction ? The Cooptalite support team is there to serve you! Send us your feedBack from the plateform and we guarantee an answer in less than 24 hours.
No worries! Cooptalite hosts your person: No worries! Cooptalite hosts your personal data on highly secure servers based in Europe.
